0.text: Bug 121111  Bad event handler class name does not cause an error.

1.text: Open a report design, open any Data Set's Property editor.

2.text: Type in an invalid Java class name for the "Event Handler Class" property, say "aaa".

3.text: Preview a report that uses that Data Set.

6.text: Event handlers are an integral part of a report design, and if a script handler class is not found, or if the handler throws a runtime exception, Report Engine should either stop the report execution, or show the error message in the generated report.
